TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

summary.span: 決定非 MSBuild 專案參考的輸出檔。

span.span: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput`工作所設定的特殊屬性搜尋[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]IDE 專案 Guid 和其相關聯的輸出的清單。The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. IDE 只預先解析非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案，並以這種方式分隔[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考從非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]參考。The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references. IDE 會傳回的清單[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]UnresolvedProjectReferences 專案。The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. 這可讓工作更強大使用[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]機制來操作只[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考，例如。This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as. 呼叫以取得資訊清單檔案名稱參考的特定目標，這就不可能的混合清單[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]和非-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案參考。calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

returns.span: 如果工作執行成功，則為 ；否則為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreresolvedProjectOutputs { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 字串，其中包含已解析的專案輸出。

span.span: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.

value.span: XML 字串，其中包含已解析的專案輸出。

span.span: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ ResolvedOutputPaths { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定已解析的參考路徑，這個已解析的參考路徑保留原始專案參考屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

value.span: 保留原始專案參考屬性的已解析參考路徑。

span.span: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ UnresolvedProjectReferences { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定採用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的專案參考項目。

span.span: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

value.span: 採用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的專案參考項目。

span.span: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]前解析非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案中，無法透過預先解析的輸出清單來解析專案參考項目位於[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]格式。Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
